system.description:
The troll has 3 mutations from the following list (roll [[/r 2d6]]):

1. Thick hide: +3 AC,

2. 2d10 additional eyes (canâ€™t be surprised),

3. Wings: gains MV near (fly),

4. Tentacles: gains an additional ATK tentacles +7 (1d10),

5. Fast: gains MV double near,

6. Magic resistant: immune to Tier 3 or lower spells,

7. Wallcrawler: gains MV near (climb),

8. Elite: +4 to STR, DEX, CON, or INT,

9. Acid immune,

10. Fire immune,

11. Enchanted hide: only harmed by magical sources
